Italy: Matilda of Tuscany dies of gout.
Indonesia: King Kamesvara of Kadiri ascends to the throne. Janggala ceases to exist and united under Kadiri domination, highly possible under royal marriage. During his reign Mpu Dharmaja writes Kakawin Smaradahana, a eulogy for the king and become the inspiration of Panji cycle, the tales that spreads across Southeast Asia.
China: The Wanyan chieftain Emperor Taizu of Jin declared himself emperor of the Jin dynasty.
Taizu conquered the Liao city of Huanglongfu.
